actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to clarify the eligibility of certain minors for burial in national cemeteries and to authorize use of flat grave markers in a section of Florida National Cemetery.

summary.text: Defines a "minor child" for purposes of eligibility for burial in national cemeteries as any child under 21 years old or under 23 years old if pursuing instruction at an approved educational institution. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide flat grave markers in the portion of the Florida National Cemetery which had installed pre-placed grave liners as of July 28, 1988.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the eligibility of certain minors for burial in national cemeteries and to authorize use of flat grave markers in a section of Florida National Cemetery.
